snippet: An eight-day winning streak for the stock index ended as markets cooled in reaction to a string of lackluster quarterly reports.
abstract: Eight-day winning streak for the Standard & Poor's 500-stock index ends as markets cool in reaction to string of lackluster quarterly reports.
lead_paragraph: An eight-day winning streak for the stock index ended as markets cooled in reaction to a string of lackluster quarterly reports.

headline.main: Earnings Throw Water on S.&P. 500’s Party
headline.print_headline: Earnings Throw Water On S.&P. 500’s Party
